name: Capleton
description: '''Clifton George Bailey III''' (born 13 April 1967), better known by his stage name '''Capleton''', is a Jamaican [[reggae]] and [[dancehall]] musician. He is also referred to as '''King Shango''', '''King David''', '''The Fireman''' and '''The Prophet'''. His record label is called David House Productions. He is known for his [[Rastafari]] views expressed in his songs.
